name: Proposal Engagement
summary: Scores a user’s impact through proposals by rewarding funded & concluded work with strong community ratings and penalizing unfunded low-rated proposals. Uses time decay to emphasize recent engagement.
description:
**How it works (simple):**
- Each proposal gets a **community rating** (1–5), normalized to **0..1**.
- If a proposal is **funded & concluded**, it adds a reward scaled by `funded_concluded_reward_weight`.
- If a proposal is **unfunded**, it adds a penalty scaled by `unfunded_penalty_weight` (stronger when rating is low).
- A **time decay policy** makes recent proposals matter more:
  - `engagement_window_months` (older than this → weight 0)
  - `monthly_decay_rate_percent` (drops each month bucket)

**Inputs:**
- No manual file upload.
- Data is fetched from DeepFunding Portal APIs.

**Output:**
- Per-user proposal engagement score and a JSON breakdown for auditability.

inputs.label: Funded & Concluded Reward Weight
inputs.description: Reward strength for funded + concluded proposals.

inputs.label: Engagement Window (Months)
inputs.description: Engagement window in months; proposals older than this contribute 0.

inputs.label: Monthly Decay Rate (%)
inputs.description: Decay rate per month bucket (%). Each month reduces proposal weight by this percentage.

inputs.label: Decay Bucket Size (Months)
inputs.description: Fixed bucket size used for time decay calculations.

outputs.label: Proposal Engagement by User
outputs.description: Proposal engagement score for each user

outputs.label: Proposal Engagement Details (JSON)
outputs.description: Full per-user proposal engagement breakdown including per-proposal intermediate values.
